banner.title: Track Your Health
banner.subTitle: Welcome to the Medical Care Application
banner.text: Keep track of your body health and training program with the various functions of the app.

training.title: Training Program
training.text: You can organize and follow your own training program and follow your training statistics.

health.title: Health Tracker
health.text: You can track your body statistics by entering the system and create goals for yourself.

diet.title: Diet Tracking
diet.text: You can monitor your compliance with the diet program you have prepared, thanks to the relevant screens.

weight.title: Your Weight
weight.text: Your entered body weight (It must be entered and updated by the user.)

height.title: Your Height
height.text: Your entered height (must be entered and updated by the user.)

fat.title: Body Mass Rate
fat.text: The oil rate you have entered (It must be entered and updated by the user.)

bmi.title: Your Body Mass Index
bmi.text: The data you entered is calculated and found.

stats.under: It is recommended to gain weight
stats.over: You are over the limits, it is recommended to lose weight
stats.obese: According to the data, you are within the limits of obesity, it is recommended to lose weight
stats.extremlyObese: You are far above the limits and you need to lose weight urgently.

notifyMessages.weightSuccess: Your weight has been updated successfully
notifyMessages.heightSuccess: Your height has been updated successfully
notifyMessages.fatSuccess: Your body mass rate has been updated successfully
